CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 8, 1962, pg. 32 reads:"AME Ministers Wives - During a recent meeting at Trinity AME Church, Wylie Ave. at Francis St., the above ministers wives elected officers, who were duly installed and then fellowshipped over a cup of tea. First row, left to right: Mmes.  J.J. Harris, John F. Little (president), B.F. Lee, R.C. Eberhardt.  Second row: Mmes. Lucille Owens, Katherine White, Dorothy Coffey, Allean Ford, Clara McLinn.  Third row: Mmes. R.L. Upshaw, H.C. Sloan, W.E. Storms and Sue Lewis. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of AME Ministers Wives officers, from left, first row: Mrs. J. J. Harris, Mrs. John F. Little, Mrs. B. F. Lee, Mrs. R. C. Eberhardt; second row: Lucille Owens, Katherine White, Dorothy Coffey, Allean Ford, Clara McLinn; third row: Mrs. R. L. Upshaw, Mrs. H. C. Sloan, Mrs. W. E. Storms, and Sue Lewis, gathered in Trinity AME Church
